epic.title: Go Project Setup
epic.description: Initial Go project setup and configuration.

tasks.title: Initialize Go module
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs Go module configuration.

## Tasks
- [ ] Run go mod init
- [ ] Create cmd/{{project_name}}/main.go
- [ ] Verify build works

## Acceptance Criteria
- `go build ./...` succeeds

tasks.title: Set up testing
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs automated testing.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create first _test.go file
- [ ] Configure test coverage
- [ ] Add table-driven tests

## Acceptance Criteria
- `go test ./...` runs and passes

tasks.title: Configure golangci-lint
tasks.description:
## Context
Linting catches common issues.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create .golangci.yml
- [ ] Configure linters
- [ ] Fix any lint warnings

## Acceptance Criteria
- `golangci-lint run` passes

tasks.title: Set up GitHub Actions CI
tasks.description:
## Context
CI ensures code quality.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create .github/workflows/go.yml
- [ ] Add build, test, lint steps
- [ ] Configure Go version matrix

## Acceptance Criteria
- CI runs on push and PR
- All checks pass
